body_html:
You are just fetching the value for x 4 times when you running the session. The session run is not sampling from the normal distribution every time.

Instead something like below will work?!
x = tf.random_normal(shape=(4,), mean=0.0, stddev=1.0)
sess = tf.Session()
sess.run(x)
body_text:
You are just fetching the value for x 4 times when you running the session. The session run is not sampling from the normal distribution every time.
Instead something like below will work?!
x = tf.random_normal(shape=(4,), mean=0.0, stddev=1.0)
sess = tf.Session()
sess.run(x)
body:
You are just fetching the value for **x** 4 times when you running the session. The session run is not sampling from the normal distribution every time.

Instead something like below will work?!
`x = tf.random_normal(shape=(4,), mean=0.0, stddev=1.0)`
`sess = tf.Session()`
`sess.run(x)`
